attributes.action: Make it so the government cant ban animals.
attributes.additional_details: Because most people don't support the banning of animals such as the XL bully and it can tear families apart .
attributes.background: Let the people decide what animals should be banned.

rejection.details:
We're not sure if you're just concerned about the ban on certain types of dog, or if you don't want any animals to be banned - such as those listed in the Dangerous Wild Animals Act 1976.

If you're concerned about the ban on certain types of dogs we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652050

If you want the Government to do something else you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
